item.title: other than building=yes not rendered
item.description:
From mirarki...@gmail.com on January 14, 2012 22:58:42
Other buildings than polygons tagged with building=yes isn't rendered, for instance building=office or building=apartments.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=228

item.contents:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on February 11, 2012 05:44:30
Closing this issue as the reporter did not provide the requested information.
Status: Invalid

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on February 21, 2012 11:26:41
My previous comment contains a typo, the missing tag that i added was "building=museum".

From mirarki...@gmail.com on February 23, 2012 05:51:35
Sounds like the right kind of solution to me. It's not possible today, then?
If not, maybe the top 100 or so building= values at least should be added to the tag filter.
